testcase.classname: F06_HomeSliders | user could redirect to correct URL
testcase.name: user redirect to correct page of the first slider
testcase.failure:
When user click on first control dot........................................passed Then user could click on first slider.......................................passed And validate "https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020" is correct on "first slider".failed
